NG0404:1: thugs la shin tu gus phyag 'tshal //
NG0404:3: de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes bka' stsal pa /
NG0404:4: nyon cig 'khor gyi bde gshegs rnams //
NG0404:5: rtsol bral don ni thugs nyid kyi //
NG0404:6: ye shes dag pa nyid yin te //
NG0404:7: dbyings la dbyings kyis bltas pas na //
NG0404:8: gang yang mthong ba med pa ni //
NG0404:9: de nyid mthong chen po yin //
NG0404:10: mkha' la mkha' nyid mkha' yi don //
NG0404:11: bgrod med pa zhes bya ba ste //
NG0404:12: bya bral rdzogs pa'i lung zheng bya //
NG0404:13: mkha' la mkha' bsam don de ni //
NG0404:14: bde gshegs rnams kyis de ma gzigs //
NG0404:15: bka' yang dag pa dpe med do //
NG0404:16: btsal na rtsol nad sangs mi srid //
NG0404:17: ma btsal ba ni ye shes rang *//
NG0404:18: phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kun //
NG0404:19: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin //
NG0404:20: rang bzhin med pa'i don 'di la //
NG0404:21: rtog pa gang yang mi skye na //
NG0404:22: de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid yin //
NG0404:23: chos sku chen po zhes bya ste //
NG0404:24: ye shes de nyid nyams su blang *//
NG0404:25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud las /
NG0404:26: rtsol ba dang bral ba'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste
NG0404:27: lnga pa'o // // de bar gshegs pa rnams kyis
NG0404:28: gsol pa / byang chub sems ni 'byung ba'i rtsa //
NG0404:29: sum cu rtsa gnyis nges pa ste //
NG0404:30: rtsa yi dbye ba bka' stsal 'tshal //
NG0404:32: bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje bka' stsal ba /
NG0404:33: byang chub sems ni 'byung ba dang *//
NG0404:34: bde gshegs rnams ni bsti gnas sa //
NG0404:35: steng sgo rgya srubs rtsa chen bzhi //
NG0404:36: mig rtsa gnyis dang rna rtsa gnyis //
NG0404:37: lce rtsa gnyis dang sna rtsa gnyis //
NG0404:38: 'gram rtsa gnyis dang lce'u chung gnyis //
NG0404:39: nu rtsa gnyis dang mchan rtsa gnyis //
NG0404:40: dpung rtsa gnyis dang lag ngar gnyis //
NG0404:41: pho zur gnyis dang bla rtsa gnyis //
NG0404:42: rje ngar gnyis dang long rtsa gnyis //
NG0404:43: mtheb rtsa gnyis dang sum cu gnyis //
NG0404:44: byang chub sems ni dkar dmar 'bab //
NG0404:45: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i rgyud las /
NG0404:46: rtsa'i dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o ///
NG0404:47: / de nas 'khor gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol pa /
NG0404:48: byang chub sems ni rdo rje mchog / rang bzhin gnas pa bka' stsal pa /
NG0404:49: mi dmigs bde ba bka' stsol cig khyab pa chen
NG0404:50: po bka' stsol cig / nyag gcig dgongs pa bka'
NG0404:51: stsol cig / ces gsol pa dang */ bcom ldan
NG0404:52: 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje bka' stsal pa
NG0404:53: / nyon cig 'khor gyi bde bar gshegs //
NG0404:54: yang dag ma bcos sems de la //
NG0404:55: ci yang ma g.yos byung ba n-i //
NG0404:56: bag chags zad de de bzhin nyid //
NG0404:57: de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni //
NG0404:58: gud na yod pa ma yin no //
NG0404:59: ye nas sems nyid nam 'kha' la //
NG0404:60: snang ba med pa thams cad snang *//
NG0404:61: kun snang bde ba don dam ste //
NG0404:64: 'di las gdags pa'i chos gang med //
NG0404:65: de kho na nyid mi dmigs pa //
NG0404:66: mtshan ma'i byung tshor kun med na //
NG0404:67: dmigs med mkha' yi dbus zhes bya //
NG0404:68: kun pas bdag nyid rgyal ba'i thugs //
NG0404:69: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chen po zhes //
NG0404:70: grags dang ma grags sems med pa //
NG0404:71: e maho de nyid khyab pa ste //
NG0404:72: dmigs pa med pa'i mkha' zhes bya //
NG0404:73: dbyings la dbyings nyid rang rig na //
NG0404:74: bya btsal rdzogs pa zhes bya ste //
NG0404:75: stong pa la ni stong pa sgom //
NG0404:76: stong nyid ye shes dag pa ste //
NG0404:77: dngos dang dngos med gnyis kas stong *//
NG0404:78: ye shes dang ni dbyings ma bskyed //
NG0404:79: mkha' la mkha' bsam mkha' yi don //
NG0404:80: rang bzhin med pas lhun grub sa //
NG0404:81: ye nas skye ba med pa'i don //
NG0404:82: byang chub sems ni bsgom pa yin //
NG0404:83: ye shes rang thabs ldan pa yin //
NG0404:84: gnas med mnyam pa bag la nyal //
NG0404:85: de bzhin chung ngu'i chung ngu zhing *//
NG0404:86: de las gsum ni rang bzhin gnas //
NG0404:87: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud las /
NG0404:88: rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ///
NG0404:89: / de nas 'khor gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams la /
NG0404:90: rigs kyi bu dag ces bos nas bka' stsal ba /
NG0404:91: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yi //
NG0404:92: thabs chen gdams ngag rgyud mchog 'di //
NG0404:93: gsang ba'i nges don nyid yin pas //
NG0404:94: dad brtson ma yengs gsal ba'i don //
NG0404:95: byang chub sems bsgom dam pa dag / skyes bu dam pa'i don du bshad //
NG0404:96: yongs su btad pas 'chang ba dang *//
NG0404:97: klong pa dang ni don bsam pa //
NG0404:98: lha dang lha min ma lus 'dud //
NG0404:99: thams cad dngos po ma lus pa //
NG0404:100: zil gyis non par the tshom med //
NG0404:101: de bzhin gshegs pa thabs cad kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud las /
NG0404:102: 'khor la yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o
NG0404:103: // // byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa zhes bya
NG0404:104: ba'i rgyud rnal 'byor dam ba rdzogs so // //
NG0404:105: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nya na gar+b+ha dang */
